events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the product due to fit issues.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund or exchange request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed? This will help us process your refund faster.
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and I have the original tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately once you ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label as well, it makes the return process easier.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount refunded on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting customer support. We hope to serve you again in the future under better circumstances.
